### read xml
```{R}
library(XML)
url <- 'http://opendata.epa.gov.tw/ws/Data/ATM00698/?$format=xml'
weather <- xmlToDataFrame(url)
#View(weather)
weather[ weather$SiteName == '臺北',  'Temperature'   ]
```

### Flow Control
```{R}
x=5;
if(x>3){
  print("x > 3")
}else{
  print("x <= 3")
}

if(x>3) print("x > 3") else print("x <= 3")

test = ifelse(x>3,"x > 3","x <= 3")
test

x=5;
if(x>3){
  print ("x > 3");
} else if (x ==3){
  print ("x == 3");
}else{
  print("x <= 3");
}

switch(2,print("aaa"),print("bbb"),print("ccc"))
switch("third",first=print("aaa"),second=print("bbb"),third=print("ccc"))

for(i in 1:10){
  print(i);
}

sum=0
for(i in 1:100){
  sum= sum+ i;
}
sum

sum(1:100)


sum = 0;
cnt = 0;
while(cnt <= 100){
  sum = sum + cnt;
  cnt = cnt + 1;
}
sum

mat = matrix(1:9, byrow=TRUE, nrow=3)
for(i in 1:nrow(mat)){
  for(j in 1:ncol(mat)){
    print(mat[i,j])
  }
}

for(i in seq_len(nrow(mat))) {
  for(j in seq_len(ncol(mat))) { 
    print(mat[i, j])
  }
}

```

### break / next
```{R}
#break(跳出迴圈)
for(n in 1:10){
  if(n==5){
    break
  }
  print(n)
}

#next(略過本次,類似python continue)
for(n in 1:10){
  if(n==5){
    next
  }
  print(n)
}

```
